titleStmt.title: The dagonizing of Bartholomew Fayre, caused through the Lord Majors command, for the battering downe the vanities of the gentiles, comprehended in flag and pole, appertayning to puppet-play. The 23. of August being the day before the apostolicke fayre.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
Bound and filmed with Wing C4331: The cities loyaltie to their King. [London : s.n., 1647].
